Player.Name: Sachin Ramesh Tendulkar
Player.Remarks: Like loads of other cricketers, Sachin is pretty superstitious-he will always put on his left pad before his right whenever he is getting padded up

Player.Name: Sourav Chandidas Ganguly
Player.Remarks: In one county match Ganguly, after reaching his fifty, raised his bat to the home balcony, only to find it deserted.

Player.Name: Edison Arantes do Nascimento
Player.Remarks: He was given the title of Athlete of the Century by the International Olympic Committee

Player.Name: Diego Armando Maradona
Player.Remarks: His Remarks after the Hand of God Goal, I was waiting for my teammates to embrace me, and no one came . . . I told them, 'Come hug me, or the referee isn't going to allow it.

Player.Name: Pete Sampras
Player.Remarks: Sampras won a record 14 Grand Slam singles titles during his career

Player.Name: Roger Fedrer
Player.Remarks: Sampras won a 12 Grand Slam singles titles during his career
